description:
"...unbelievably wicked!"-- David Pogue, New York Times
"...a winning application."-- The Washington Post

Leave your laptop at home - Access your computers on an iPhone/iPad from anywhere. 
Top 30 Business app with over 6100 user reviews from all over the world!

iTeleport is the most fully featured, easy to use and robust remote desk top app that gives anytime access to multiple computers (PC, Mac, Linux) from your home, office or anywhere in the world

+ This is the UNIVERSAL version for use on iPhone, iPad & iPod touch 
+ Enjoy blazing fast connections to your Mac with our most recent update!
+ Now integrated with Box Cloud 
+ Connect to 1, 5 or 20 computers – iTeleport gives you UNLIMITED access
+ Connect from Home, office, Airport  – iTeleport gives you ANYWHERE & EVERYWHERE access
+ Remotely control your computers over WiFi, 3G, 4G/LTE
+ Control & Access ANY application or file  on your Mac, PC  - Office, Powerpoint, Excel, Word, Photoshop with full compatibility
+ Easy PC, Mac and Linux set up for VNC & RDP
+ 24/7 Customer Support
+ Secure 128-Bit AES Encryption 
+ Education discounts applies
+ Used by IT admin, Small business, Sales teams, teachers, doctors, lawyers etc 


What others have said:
"...unbelievably wicked!"-- David Pogue, New York Times
"...a winning application."-- The Washington Post
"Best. iPhone. Application. Ever."-- The Boy Genius Report

User reviews:
"Best VNC in the app store...this one does it all" ***** 
"...you'll be amazed. It works incredibly well over 3G. So cool!" *****
"Really quite amazing... they took an almost perfect app and made it perfect... if there was a 10 star rating, that is what I would give this app..." *****

OTHER FEATURES
*Optimized for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+
*Support for ALL International keyboards & Bluetooth keyboard support
* Intuitive and patented interface, iTeleport gives you full control of your computer's mouse and keyboard, and provides   a rich visual display of your computer screens, without any screen resolution limit. 
* Visit Flash-based websites from your iPhone (Audio streaming is NOT supported on VNC. This is a limitation of the VNC protocol)
* Advance PowerPoint slides while reading your presenter notes
* Control your media player from anywhere
* Use your iPhone as a wireless touchpad + keyboard + media remote
* Supports Ctrl-Alt-Del and other combination keystrokes
* Supports Mac (Lion, Snow Leopard, Leopard, Tiger, Vine Server) and all Windows editions (with free VNC servers: TightVNC, UltraVNC, and RealVNC). Also supports Linux VNCServer and Vino, as well as AMX Touchscreen Interfaces.
* Supports RDP servers, including Network Level Authentication
* SSH Encryption support for all platforms. For details, visit www.iTeleportMobile.com/support/secure
* Supports VPN-based encryption
* Supports VGA out
* Supports speech recognition for dictation for iphone 4S and newer 
* Wake-on-LAN support allows you to wake computers from sleep under some conditions. For details, see www.iTeleportMobile.com/support/wake
* You can even use iTeleport when you don't have an Internet connection, and want to control your laptop while giving a presentation
* iTeleport can handle very high resolution displays, e.g. dual Apple Cinema displays at 5120x1600.

Visit www.iTeleportMobile.com for setup instructions and usage tips.

Get iTeleport now and get connected!

If you experience ANY problem with the app, PLEASE contact us at support@iteleportmobile.com and we will work with you to resolve the issue and will fix it as soon as possible. Thanks! We TRULY appreciate your support. 
The iTeleport Team
releaseNotes:
Updates:
 - Fixed screen placement issue when keyboard is displayed in landscape mode.
 - Stability improvements for iOS 8 and OS X Yosemite

Including:
 - iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+ support
 - Compatibility updates for iOS 8
 - Device lock support (iOS 8 required)
 - Multi-monitor support
 - Bug fixes and stability improvements

Note: to enable multi-monitor support for existing servers, tap the details disclosure icon, followed by: "Advanced", "Encodings", and ensure "Mac Multi-Monitor" is enabled. 

If you need assistance, please contact our support team via: http://support.iteleportmobile.com
